verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.
But I have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2073>habitation<s%> for thee, and a <S%H4349>place<s%> for thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the whole <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who hath with his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> that which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> among all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> in, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be there; neither <S%H977>chose<s%> I any <S%H376>man<s%> to be a <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
But I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be there; and have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, Forasmuch as it was in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, thou didst <S%H2895>well<s%> in that it was in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>:

<S%H7535>Notwithstanding<s%> thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; but thy <S%H1121>son<s%> which shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of thy <S%H2504>loins<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> therefore hath <S%H6965>performed<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: for I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the room of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and am <S%H3427>set<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%>, and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And in <S%H8033>it<s%> have I <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, wherein is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he <S%H3772>made<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the presence of all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%>:

For <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H3595>scaffold<s%>, of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high<s%>, and had <S%H5414>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5835>court<s%>: and upon it he <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and kneeled <S%H1288>down<s%> upon his <S%H1290>knees<s%> before all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like thee in the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, nor in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; which <S%H8104>keepest<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and shewest <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee with all their <S%H3820>hearts<s%>:

Thou which hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> him; and <S%H1696>spakest<s%> with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Now therefore, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; yet <S%H7535>so<s%> that thy <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H8451>law<s%>, as thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

Now then, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, let thy <S%H1697>word<s%> be <S%H539>verified<s%>, which thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

But will <S%H430>God<s%> in very <S%H552>deed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H120>men<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>? behold, <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> cannot <S%H3557>contain<s%> thee; how much less this <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%>!

Have <S%H6437>respect<s%> therefore to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and to his <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee:

That thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> upon this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, upon the <S%H4725>place<s%> whereof thou hast <S%H559>said<s%> that thou wouldest <S%H7760>put<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> there; to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hearken<s%> therefore unto the <S%H8469>supplications<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they shall <S%H6419>make<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>: <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, even from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and when thou <S%H8085>hearest<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>.

¶ If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> upon him to make him <S%H422>swear<s%>, and the <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, by <S%H7725>requiting<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, by <S%H5414>recompensing<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>; and by <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

¶ And if thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be put to the <S%H5062>worse<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> to them and to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ When the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up<s%>, and there is no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; yet if they <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, when thou dost <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them;

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when thou hast <S%H3384>taught<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, wherein they should <S%H3212>walk<s%>; and <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

¶ If there be <S%H7458>dearth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, if there be <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, if there be <S%H7711>blasting<s%>, or <S%H3420>mildew<s%>, <S%H697>locusts<s%>, or <S%H2625>caterpillers<s%>; if their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H8179>cities<s%> of their <S%H776>land<s%>; whatsoever <S%H5061>sore<s%> or whatsoever <S%H4245>sickness<s%> there be:

Then what <S%H8605>prayer<s%> or what <S%H8467>supplication<s%> soever shall be made of any <S%H120>man<s%>, or of all thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when every <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> his own <S%H5061>sore<s%> and his own <S%H4341>grief<s%>, and shall spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%>, and <S%H5414>render<s%> unto every <S%H376>man<s%> according unto all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>; (for thou only <S%H3045>knowest<s%> the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>:)

That they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, so long <S%H3117>as<s%> they <S%H2416%H6440>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ Moreover concerning the <S%H5237>stranger<s%>, which is not of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but is <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> for thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, and thy <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and thy stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>; if they <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%>;

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, even from thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> to thee for; that all <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, as doth thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

If thy <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> against their <S%H341>enemies<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou shalt <S%H7971>send<s%> them, and they <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto thee <S%H1870>toward<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>;
Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>.

If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against thee, (for there is no <S%H120>man<s%> which <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> not,) and thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with them, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them over <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captives<s%> unto a <S%H776>land<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> or <S%H7138>near<s%>;

Yet if they <S%H7725%H3824>bethink<s%> themselves in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither they are carried <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H2603>pray<s%> unto thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, we have done <S%H5753>amiss<s%>, and have dealt <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>;

If they <S%H7725>return<s%> to thee with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with all their <S%H5315>soul<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, whither they have carried them <S%H7617>captives<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and toward the <S%H5892>city<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, even from thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%>, their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplications<s%>, and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%>, and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> which have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee.

Now, my <S%H430>God<s%>, let, I beseech thee, thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H6605>open<s%>, and let thine <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attent<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> that is made in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H6965>arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, into thy <S%H5118>resting<s%> place, thou, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>: let thy <S%H3548>priests<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8668>salvation<s%>, and let thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2896>goodness<s%>.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, turn not <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>: <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
